betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The farm is the foundation of survival. Use a copper hoe or better to till the soil near water to create farmland where you can plant seeds. You can obtain seeds by clicking on a grass block with a hoe. Pam's Harvestcraft adds new crops and recipes for unique dishes. Spice of Life increases health through food variety, while monotony reduces saturation. Track your diet in the Food Book (book + carrot).

Also, don't forget about the luchbag/lunchbox, which you can open by right-clicking. Place food inside, close it, and use it as an automatic food dispenser to maintain your diet. Just press Shift + right-click to open it, and you can eat.

Diversify your diet to thrive!
